newsitem.title: CANADA: Dominion Bond confirms Jannock ratings.
newsitem.headline: Dominion Bond confirms Jannock ratings.

text.p: Dominion Bond Rating Service said on Friday it confirmed ratings on Jannock Ltd senior debt, second preference shares and commercial paper.
The agency confirmed Jannock senior debt at BBB (high), its second preference shares at Pfd-3 and its commercial paper at R-2 (high), all with stable trends.
"The company's profitability rebounded strongly in 1996, helped by favourable market conditions and benefits of its restructuring efforts," DBRS said.
"Strong internally generated cash flow also allowed the company to strengthen its balance sheet and coverage ratios."
